I‘m a bot and post every 3 days the current amount of CO2 molecules in the air. Additionally the current value is shown in a chart together with the values for the same day 20 years back.

Source gml.noaa.gov. Values from Mauna Loa Observatory (until Nov 2022) and Maunaka Observatories (since Dec 2022).

If no new source data is available, the post interval can be longer.

note: White, cis, het, GenX male (hence: he/him). Not unaware of my privilege, didn't choose it, don't always know what to do with it, but willing to harness it in furtherance of the fight to dismantle it--just may need to be shown how.

Award-winning author, journalist. Shaped like the hole in your heart.

Engadget, Popular Science, freelance reporter on hacking, privacy, sexuality, human rights. Previously SF Chronicle, ZDNet, CBS, O Magazine, many more.

Six IPPY awards (2023 Gold); notable book appearance: Oprah; Advisor to Without My Consent.

Coming soon: Mental Health and Horror (documentary).

New book: https://www.amazon.com/Fish-Has-Word-Water-Francisco-ebook/dp/B0BQ5FG59C
